data.email:
Subject: Follow-Up: Cross-Functional Planning & Q4 Roadmap

Hi team,

Thank you for a productive cross-functional planning meeting. We discussed sprint scheduling, backlog prioritization, and upcoming design handoffs. The team agreed on the importance of finalizing our next sprint's roadmap and improving visibility into task dependencies to avoid bottlenecks.

**Key Decisions**
• The sprint roadmap for Q4 initiatives has been approved.
• We will begin weekly progress reviews on Monday mornings.

**Action Items**
• Riley & Sofia — Finalize Q4 roadmap slides by Friday.
• Diego — Audit backlog and flag dependency blockers by Thursday.
• Taylor & Nina — Share finalized sprint calendar with all leads by Monday.
• Casey — Prepare design handoff checklist.

**Next Meeting:** Next Monday 9 AM

Thanks for your contributions and focus on these important next steps.

Best,
